monsters.name: Knight in Plate Armor
monsters.description: A heavily armored warrior sworn to a lord, wielding a longsword and shield.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.description: A masterwork steel longsword strikes with precision!

attacks.name: Shield Bash
attacks.description: The heavy shield crashes into you!

specialAbilities.name: Second Wind
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, can heal 2d10+9 HP as a bonus action.

specialAbilities.name: Action Surge
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, can take an additional action on their turn.

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor Master
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

flavorText: Steel clanks as a fully armored knight steps forward!
A knight in shining plate armor levels their sword at you!
The flower of chivalry stands ready - a true knight challenges you!
monsters.defeatedText: The knight falls with a crash of metal, honor intact even in defeat.

monsters.name: Young Red Dragon
monsters.description: A fearsome dragon with crimson scales and the ability to breathe devastating fire.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Massive jaws filled with razor teeth clamp down!

specialAbilities.name: Fire Breath
specialAbilities.description: Recharge 5-6: Exhales fire in 30-foot cone. DC 17 DEX save or take 16d6 fire damage (half on success).

specialAbilities.name: Frightful Presence
specialAbilities.description: Creatures within 120 feet must succeed DC 16 WIS save or be frightened for 1 minute.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes one bite and two claw attacks per turn.

flavorText: Wings beat the air - a red dragon descends with a roar!
Flames lick the edges of its maw as the dragon prepares to strike!
The ancient enemy of knights appears - a red dragon!
monsters.defeatedText: The dragon's roar fades to a whimper as it collapses, treasure unclaimed.

monsters.name: Necromancer
monsters.description: A dark wizard who commands the forces of death and undeath.

attacks.name: Withering Touch
attacks.description: Life-draining energy flows from skeletal fingers!

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: Can cast: Ray of Sickness, Blindness/Deafness, Animate Dead, Blight, Cloudkill, Circle of Death. Spell save DC 16, +8 to hit.

specialAbilities.name: Summon Undead
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, summons 2d4 skeletons or zombies to fight.

specialAbilities.name: Undead Fortitude
specialAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP, can make DC 15 CON save to drop to 1 HP instead (once per day).

flavorText: A dark figure emerges, surrounded by an aura of death!
Skeletal hands weave patterns in the air - a necromancer!
The temperature drops as death magic fills the air!
monsters.defeatedText: The necromancer's dark magic dissipates as they fall, their undead servants crumbling to dust.

monsters.name: Veteran Archer
monsters.description: A master bowman with years of experience, deadly at any range.

attacks.name: Longbow
attacks.description: An arrow flies true, seeking vital areas!

attacks.name: Shortsword
attacks.description: A quick blade thrust in close combat!

specialAbilities.name: Sharpshooter
specialAbilities.description: Can choose to take -5 to attack roll for +10 damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes three longbow attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Evasion
specialAbilities.description: When makes DEX save, takes no damage on success and half on failure.

flavorText: An arrow nocks - a veteran archer has you in their sights!
Calm and deadly, the archer draws their bow!
Years of practice show in every movement - a master archer!
monsters.defeatedText: The archer's bow falls from their hands as they slump to the ground.

monsters.name: Vampire Spawn
monsters.description: A lesser vampire, servant to a vampire lord, hungering for blood.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Fangs pierce flesh, draining blood! (Plus 2d6 necrotic damage, target max HP reduced by damage taken)

specialAbilities.name: Regeneration
specialAbilities.description: Regains 10 HP at start of turn if has at least 1 HP. Only radiant damage or sunlight prevents this.

specialAbilities.name: Spider Climb
specialAbilities.description: Can climb walls and ceilings without checks.

specialAbilities.name: Vampire Weaknesses
specialAbilities.description: Takes 20 radiant damage when in sunlight. Cannot enter homes without invitation.

flavorText: A pale figure emerges from the shadows, fangs bared!
Red eyes gleam with unholy hunger - a vampire spawn!
The undead predator hisses and prepares to feed!
monsters.defeatedText: The vampire spawn crumbles to ash, its unlife ended.

monsters.name: War Priest
monsters.description: A holy warrior who channels divine power in service of their god.

attacks.name: Blessed Mace
attacks.description: A holy mace glows with radiant energy! (Plus 2d8 radiant damage)

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: Can cast: Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds, Spiritual Weapon, Spirit Guardians, Guardian of Faith, Flame Strike. Spell save DC 16, +8 to hit.

specialAbilities.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
specialAbilities.description: All undead within 30 feet must make DC 16 WIS save or be turned for 1 minute.

specialAbilities.name: Divine Strike
specialAbilities.description: Once per turn, deals extra 2d8 radiant damage on weapon hit.

flavorText: Divine light surrounds a war priest as they advance!
A holy warrior calls upon their god's power!
Prayers and steel combine - a war priest enters battle!
monsters.defeatedText: The war priest's prayers fade as they fall, still clutching their holy symbol.

monsters.name: Siege Engine Operator
monsters.description: A trained soldier manning a trebuchet or ballista, raining destruction from afar.

attacks.name: Ballista Bolt
attacks.description: A massive bolt the size of a spear flies at you!

attacks.name: War Hammer
attacks.description: A heavy hammer swings in close combat!

specialAbilities.name: Siege Weapon Expert
specialAbilities.description: Ballista attacks deal double damage to structures and objects.

specialAbilities.name: Reload
specialAbilities.description: Must use bonus action to reload ballista after firing.

flavorText: The creak of machinery - a siege weapon aims at you!
An engineer cranks the ballista, targeting you!
The siege operator grins as they load another massive bolt!
monsters.defeatedText: The siege operator falls, their weapon left unmanned.
